quoteText: • You may not use the name of other servers or brands to advertise your resource unless consent has been given. This means that resources such as "XXXX inspired by YYYY.net" / "AAAA like BBBB" are not allowed unless YYYY.net has given permission for their brand to be used in this way.
title: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed

tosdr.case: If you are the target of a copyright claim, your content may be removed
